item.title: Print Directly To Kinko’s
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: Someone in the office has a large color print job coming up (290 pages, 50 copies) and I was suggesting that our color printer probably wouldn’t be the best choice for that. So I started poking around the Fedex Kinko’s site to see what sort of options they had. That was when I came across […]
item.content:encoded: Someone in the office has a large color print job coming up (290 pages, 50 copies) and I was suggesting that our color printer probably wouldn’t be the best choice for that. So I started poking around the Fedex Kinko’s site to see what sort of options they had. That was when I came across their PC to Kinko’s print software that allows you to send a print job from your computer to Kinko’s. What a great idea. I wonder how long this service has been around.
